attributes.title: Book launch: Online Influence, with Bas Wouters
attributes.summary: Together with the author we’ll explore what makes this a very practical book suited for all digital marketeers and how it's different from the books and content you already know from Cialdini, BJ Fogg and Kahneman.
attributes.formatted_summary: Together with the author we’ll explore what makes this a very practical book suited for all digital marketeers and how it's different from the books and content you already know from Cialdini, BJ Fogg and Kahneman.
